Your Ad Blocker may affect your Geneanet experience.

Geneanet is ad free and your Ad Blocker may affect your Geneanet experience. We suggest that you turn off your Ad Blocker when using Geneanet (click on AdBlock icon then deselect "Enabled on this site").

Geneanet > Search > Search all records

Search all records

Settings

Search your ancestors in the #1 European genealogical database. This search engine gives you access to all the Geneanet collections: family trees, archival documents, cemeteries...

See also

Archives and Documents

Geneanet and its partners offer you to view records in text format (parish and civil registers, families, wills).

Cemeteries and Memorials

Find your ancestors on pictures of graves and memorials

Genealogy Library

The Genealogy Library provides hundreds of thousands books and documents to help you grow your family tree.

Collections Catalog

Explore the Geneanet library resources, and access digitized archives, old newspapers and historical books.

Your alerts

The Geneanet alerts allow you to be notified when new results are available.

Hints

Automatically compare all individuals in your family tree to the Geneanet database and easily find new information!

Search by country

Would you like to search for a specific country? Use our specific search form.

Popularity of your last name

Find out the popularity of names indexed on Geneanet.

  • Geneastar
Geneanet is a leading genealogy website with over 5 million members. Create your family tree for free and find your ancestors! The Geneanet store lists hundreds of genealogy items: genealogy magazines and handbooks, regional books, family trees to fill out, and more. On Geneastar, the website dedicated to famous family trees, discover the genealogy of more than 20,000 famous people from yesterday and today, and find your famous cousins! Geneawiki is a free French- speaking genealogy encyclopedia, written collaboratively by thousands of visitors and launched by Geneanet. Memory of Places allows you to discover the history of places: streets, businesses, residents, and key events.

Wildcard character

(question mark) to match one letter, or use * (asterisk character) to match one or more letters.If you are searching the Bonhams but not the Bonham Carters, enter 'Bonham' in the name field and enter 'Carter' in the names to exclude.If you are searching the Bonhams but not the Bonham Carters, enter 'Bonham' in the name field and enter 'Carter' in the names to exclude.If you are searching the Bonhams but not the Bonham Carters, enter 'Bonham' in the name field and enter 'Carter' in the names to exclude.If you are searching the Bonhams but not the Bonham Carters, enter 'Bonham' in the name field and enter 'Carter' in the names to exclude.If you are searching the Bonhams but not the Bonham Carters, enter 'Bonham' in the name field and enter 'Carter' in the names to exclude.If you are searching the Bonhams but not the Bonham Carters, enter 'Bonham' in the name field and enter 'Carter' in the names to exclude.You can search a country, a county or a city/town. After: Events which occurred after this date. Minimum between: First known event for an individual occurred between these two dates.
